sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>rain</radical> is hated so much by <radical>wolverine</radical>s, so they always want to live in the <kanji>snow</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Imagine rain falling on a wolverine and how much they hate it, so the wolverine moves up north to somewhere with lots of snow.
readingMnemonic: You ask the wolverine, "Why do you want this <kanji>snow</kanji> so bad?" He replies quickly: "Because the rain is <reading>yucky</reading>" (<ja>ゆき</ja>).
readingInfo: He keeps saying "Yucky yucky yucky" over and over again. Imagine him doing this with an accent that would bring the word closer to <ja>ゆき</ja>.
